long_description: Run the ENO Talon Ridgeline above your ENO hammock (sold separately) to create a handy place to stash accessories and hang a small lantern. Includes a 25 ft. line that you run above your hammock; 6 hooks with prusik knots let you adjust the tension of the Ridgeline and attach accessories. Storage pocket attaches to 2 of the hooks and gives you a convenient place to keep a headlamp, book, glasses and other small items. ENO Talon Ridgeline can also can be used to help you set up and position your hammock rainfly (sold separately).
short_description: Run the ENO Talon Ridgeline above your ENO hammock (sold separately) to create a handy place to stash accessories and hang a small lantern.
